spells.name: Acid Splash
spells.description: The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d6 acid damage.

spells.name: Blade Ward
spells.description: You gain resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

spells.name: Fire Bolt
spells.description: Make a ranged spell attack. On hit, the target takes 1d10 fire damage.

spells.name: Light
spells.materials: a firefly or phosphorescent moss
spells.description: The object sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet.

spells.name: Mage Hand
spells.description: You create an invisible spectral hand that can manipulate objects.

spells.name: Prestidigitation
spells.description: Create a minor magical effect such as lighting a candle or creating a flavor.

spells.name: Shocking Grasp
spells.description: Make a melee spell attack. On hit, the target takes 1d8 lightning damage and cannot take reactions until the start of its next turn.

spells.name: Armor of Agathys
spells.materials: a cup of water
spells.description: You gain 5 temporary hit points. When a creature hits you with a melee attack, it takes 5 cold damage.

spells.name: Burning Hands
spells.description: Each creature in a 15-foot cone must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking 3d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

spells.name: Command
spells.description: You utter a one-word command to a creature you can see. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or follow your command.

spells.name: Cure Wounds
spells.description: A creature you touch regains 3d8 hit points.

spells.name: Detect Magic
spells.description: You sense the presence of magic within 30 feet of you.

spells.name: Entangle
spells.description: Grasping weeds spring up in a 20-foot square. Creatures in the area must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be restrained.

spells.name: False Life
spells.materials: a small amount of alcohol or distilled spirits
spells.description: You gain 1d4+4 temporary hit points.

spells.name: Grease
spells.materials: a bit of pork rind or butter
spells.description: Slick grease covers a 10-foot square. Creatures must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw to avoid falling prone.

spells.name: Healing Word
spells.description: A creature you can see within range regains 2d4 hit points.

spells.name: Magic Missile
spells.description: You create three glowing darts. Each dart hits a creature you choose within range, dealing 1d4+1 force damage.

spells.name: Shield
spells.description: You gain a +5 bonus to AC against one attack that would hit you.

spells.name: Sleep
spells.materials: a pinch of fine sand, rose petals, or a cricket
spells.description: You roll 5d8; subtract the total from creatures' hit points in order, starting with the weakest.

spells.name: Thunderwave
spells.description: Each creature in a 15-foot cube must make a Constitution saving throw or take 2d8 thunder damage and be pushed 5 feet away.

spells.name: Acid Arrow
spells.materials: powdered rhubarb leaf and an adder's stomach
spells.description: Make a ranged spell attack. On hit, the target takes 4d4 acid damage immediately and 2d4 acid damage at the end of its next turn.

spells.name: Blindness/Deafness
spells.description: A creature you can see must make a Constitution saving throw or be blinded or deafened (your choice) for the duration.

spells.name: Flaming Sphere
spells.materials: a bit of tallow, a pinch of brimstone, and a dusting of powdered iron
spells.description: A sphere of flames appears and moves where you direct it. Creatures within 5 feet must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking 2d6 fire damage on a failed save.

spells.name: Gust of Wind
spells.materials: a legume seed
spells.description: A line of strong wind 60 feet long and 10 feet wide blasts from you. Creatures in the area must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be pushed 15 feet away.

spells.name: Heat Metal
spells.materials: a piece of iron and a flame
spells.description: Choose metal you can see. A creature wearing or holding that metal must make a Constitution saving throw or take 2d8 fire damage.

spells.name: Invisibility
spells.materials: an eyelash encased in gum arabic
spells.description: A creature you touch becomes invisible for the duration.

spells.name: Knock
spells.description: You can open any door, chest, or lock within range that can be opened by a key.

spells.name: Mirror Image
spells.description: Three illusory copies of yourself appear. Attackers have disadvantage against you, and when they hit, roll 1d6 to determine which is real.

spells.name: Scorching Ray
spells.description: You hurl three rays of fire. Make a ranged spell attack for each ray, dealing 2d6 fire damage on a hit.

spells.name: Shatter
spells.materials: a chip of mica
spells.description: Each creature in a 10-foot radius sphere must make a Constitution saving throw or take 3d8 thunder damage.

spells.name: Web
spells.materials: a bit of spiderweb
spells.description: You conjure a web filling a 20-foot cube. The area is difficult terrain and creatures are restrained if caught.

spells.name: Animate Dead
spells.materials: the corpse and black ink worth at least 50 sp
spells.description: You animate a corpse or skeleton to fight for you.

spells.name: Dispel Magic
spells.materials: an opal worth at least 50 sp
spells.description: You neutralize a spell of 3rd level or lower affecting a creature or object. For spells higher than 3rd level, make an Intelligence saving throw.

spells.name: Fireball
spells.materials: a tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur
spells.description: Each creature in a 20-foot radius sphere must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 8d6 fire damage.

spells.name: Fly
spells.materials: a feather from any bird
spells.description: A creature you touch gains a flying speed of 60 feet for the duration.

spells.name: Gaseous Form
spells.materials: a bit of gauze and a wisp of smoke
spells.description: A creature you touch becomes a cloud of gas for the duration.

spells.name: Glyph of Warding
spells.materials: incense worth 200 sp, which the spell consumes
spells.description: You inscribe a glyph that triggers when someone enters an area or manipulates an object.

spells.name: Haste
spells.materials: a shaving of licorice root
spells.description: A creature you choose gains an extra action and movement for the duration.

spells.name: Lightning Bolt
spells.materials: a bit of fur and a rod of amber, crystal, or glass
spells.description: Each creature in a 100-foot line must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 8d6 lightning damage.

spells.name: Material Plane
spells.description: You perceive the Material Plane from another plane.

spells.name: Slow
spells.materials: a drop of treacle
spells.description: A creature you can see must make a Wisdom saving throw or be slowed (disadvantage on attacks and saves).

spells.name: Blight
spells.description: A creature or plant you can see must make a Constitution saving throw or take 8d8 necrotic damage.

spells.name: Confusion
spells.materials: three nut shells
spells.description: Creatures in a 10-foot radius must make a Wisdom saving throw or become confused.

spells.name: Dimension Door
spells.description: You teleport yourself and one other creature to a location you can see within 500 feet.

spells.name: Fire Shield
spells.materials: phosphorus, a firefly, or a piece of warm iron
spells.description: You gain immunity to fire damage and deal 2d8 fire or cold damage to creatures that hit you.

spells.name: Greater Invisibility
spells.description: A creature becomes invisible even while attacking or casting spells.

spells.name: Ice Storm
spells.materials: a pinch of dust and a few drops of water
spells.description: Each creature in a 20-foot radius cylinder must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 2d8 bludgeoning and 4d6 cold damage.

spells.name: Polymorph
spells.materials: a caterpillar cocoon
spells.description: A creature you can see must make a Wisdom saving throw or transform into a beast of equal or lower CR.

spells.name: Stoneskin
spells.materials: diamond dust worth 100 sp, which the spell consumes
spells.description: A creature you touch gains resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

spells.name: Animate Objects
spells.description: You animate up to ten nonmagical objects of your choice.

spells.name: Cloudkill
spells.description: A 20-foot radius sphere of poisonous gas moves where you direct it, dealing 5d8 poison damage to creatures.

spells.name: Cone of Cold
spells.materials: a small crystal or glass cone
spells.description: Each creature in a 60-foot cone must make a Constitution saving throw or take 8d8 cold damage.

spells.name: Geas
spells.description: You compel a creature to obey a specific course of action. Violating the geas inflicts 5d10 psychic damage per day.

spells.name: Hold Person
spells.materials: a small, straight piece of iron
spells.description: A creature you can see must make a Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for the duration.

spells.name: Legend Lore
spells.materials: incense worth 250 sp, which the spell consumes, and four ivory strips worth 50 sp each
spells.description: You learn legendary information about a person, place, or object.

spells.name: Teleportation Circle
spells.materials: rare chalks and inks infused with precious gems worth 50 sp, which the spell consumes
spells.description: You create a circle that teleports creatures to another teleportation circle you specify.

spells.name: Wall of Force
spells.materials: a pinch of powder made by grinding an emerald into dust
spells.description: You create an invisible wall of force up to 30 feet long, 20 feet high, and 1 foot thick.

spells.name: Disintegrate
spells.materials: a lodestone and a pinch of powder iron
spells.description: A beam of green energy springs from your finger. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 10d8 force damage. If it's reduced to 0 hp, it disintegrates.

spells.name: Eyebite
spells.description: For the spell's duration, your eyes become an inky void. You gain various magical sight abilities.

spells.name: Chain Lightning
spells.materials: a piece of fur; a piece of amber, crystal, or glass; and a pinch of salt
spells.description: You hurl a bolt of lightning that arcs between creatures. Each creature must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 10d8 lightning damage.

spells.name: Contingency
spells.materials: a statuette of yourself carved from ivory and decorated with gems worth at least 1,500 sp
spells.description: You choose a spell of 5th level or lower and set a trigger. When triggered, the spell is cast automatically.

spells.name: Globe of Invulnerability
spells.materials: a glass or crystal bead that shatters when the spell ends
spells.description: An immobile, invisible sphere of magical force surrounds you. Spells of 5th level or lower can't affect creatures or objects within the sphere.

spells.name: Mass Suggestion
spells.materials: a snake's tongue and either a bit of honeycomb or a drop of sweet oil
spells.description: You suggest an action (a sentence long) to up to 12 creatures you can see. They make Wisdom saves or are charmed and follow the suggestion.

spells.name: Move Earth
spells.materials: an iron blade and a small bag containing a mixture of soilsâ€”clay, loam, and sand
spells.description: You choose an area of terrain up to 40 feet on each side. You can raise or lower terrain, create ramps, or move earth.

spells.name: True Seeing
spells.materials: an ointment for the eyes that costs 25 sp, made from mushroom powder, saffron, and fat
spells.description: A creature you touch gains the ability to see in all conditions and perceive illusions and hidden things.

spells.name: Delayed Blast Fireball
spells.materials: a tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur
spells.description: A sphere of fire appears at a point within range. At the end of each turn, you can detonate it or move it. When detonated, each creature in a 20-foot radius makes a Dexterity save or takes 12d6 fire damage.

spells.name: Forcecage
spells.materials: ruby dust worth 1,500 sp
spells.description: You create an invisible, immobile, cube-shaped prison of magical force up to 20 feet on a side.

spells.name: Greater Restoration
spells.materials: diamond dust worth at least 100 sp, which the spell consumes
spells.description: You imbue a creature with positive energy. It regains 4d8+15 hit points and is freed of curses, diseases, and poisons.

spells.name: True Polymorph
spells.materials: a caterpillar cocoon
spells.description: Transform a creature into another creature, an object into another object, or a creature into an object permanently.

spells.name: Wish
spells.description: You can alter reality. You can duplicate any spell of 8th level or lower, create objects, grant immunity, or make other profound changes.

spells.name: Time Stop
spells.description: You briefly stop the flow of time. For 1d4+1 turns, you can act freely while other creatures are frozen in time.

spells.name: Meteor Swarm
spells.description: Meteor-like projectiles streak toward four points you choose within range. Creatures in 40-foot radius spheres must make Dexterity saves or take 20d6 fire and 20d6 bludgeoning damage.

spells.name: Prismatic Wall
spells.description: A wall of prismatic light springs from a point you choose within range. It has 7 colored layers, each providing different protections and dealing damage.

spells.name: True Resurrection
spells.materials: a sprinkle of holy water and diamonds worth at least 25,000 sp, which the spell consumes
spells.description: You return a dead creature to life even if more than 200 years have passed since death. The creature comes back fully alive with no penalties.

spells.name: Aid
spells.materials: a tiny strip of white cloth
spells.description: You choose up to three creatures. Each gains 5 temporary hit points and gains advantage on Wisdom saves for the duration.

spells.name: Arcanist's Magic Aura
spells.description: You make an object appear magical or non-magical, or disguise its actual alignment/aura.

spells.name: Bestow Curse
spells.description: You curse a creature you can touch. The target has disadvantage on Wisdom saves or takes 1d8 necrotic damage per turn.

spells.name: Bless Undead
spells.materials: a drop of oil blessed by a cleric
spells.description: An undead creature you touch gains advantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

spells.name: Blur
spells.description: Attack rolls against you have disadvantage while you're not incapacitated.

spells.name: Call Lightning
spells.description: A storm cloud appears above a point you choose. As an action, you can call down a lightning bolt dealing 3d10 lightning damage.

spells.name: Clairvoyance
spells.materials: a focus worth at least 100 sp, such as a crystal ball, silver mirror, or scrying pool
spells.description: You see through the eyes of a creature or an object within range. You can see if the target is willing.

spells.name: Counterspell
spells.description: When a creature within 60 feet casts a spell, you can use your reaction to attempt to interrupt it.

spells.name: Create Food and Water
spells.description: You create up to 45 pounds of food and/or 30 gallons of fresh water that appears in containers of your choice.

spells.name: Cure Disease
spells.description: You cure a disease or neutralize a poison afflicting a creature within reach.

spells.name: Darkness
spells.materials: bat fur and a drop of pitch or piece of coal
spells.description: Magical darkness spreads in a 15-foot radius sphere. Darkvision can't see through it and nonmagical light doesn't illuminate it.

spells.name: Daylight
spells.materials: a sunflower petal
spells.description: A 60-foot radius sphere of bright daylight appears centered on a point you choose. Undead and creatures that hate sunlight have disadvantage on attack rolls.

spells.name: Death Ward
spells.description: A creature you touch is protected from death. The first time it would take damage that would reduce it to 0 hp, instead it drops to 1 hp.

spells.name: Teleport
spells.description: You and up to 8 creatures you choose within range teleport to a destination you're familiar with.

spells.name: Magnificent Mansion
spells.materials: a miniature portal carved from ivory, a small piece of polished marble, and a tiny silver spoon, each item worth at least 5 sp
spells.description: You conjure an extradimensional dwelling. It can accommodate up to 100 Medium creatures and is furnished as you wish.

spells.name: Plane Shift
spells.materials: a forked, metal rod worth at least 250 sp attuned to a particular plane of existence
spells.description: You and up to 8 creatures you choose teleport to another plane of existence.

spells.name: Reverse Gravity
spells.materials: a lodestone and iron filings
spells.description: Gravity is reversed in a 50-foot radius cylinder centered on a point within range for the duration.

spells.name: Sequester
spells.materials: a powder composed of diamond, emerald, sapphire, and ruby dust worth at least 5,000 sp, which the spell consumes
spells.description: You touch a willing creature and hide it from divination and scrying as if it were behind a forcecage.

spells.name: Symbol
spells.materials: mercury, phosphorus, and diamond dust worth at least 1,000 sp, which the spell consumes
spells.description: You inscribe a magical rune that triggers an effect when creatures read or pass it.

spells.name: Arcane Gate
spells.description: You create two linked portals up to 500 feet apart. Creatures can move through them.

spells.name: Flesh to Stone
spells.materials: a pinch of lime, water, and earth
spells.description: A creature you can see must make a Constitution saving throw or begin turning to stone. It's restrained and has resistance to all damage.

spells.name: Guards and Wards
spells.materials: burning incense, a small measure of brimstone and oil, a living snake, and a small semi-precious stone
spells.description: You protect a building or structure, granting it various magical defenses and traps.

spells.name: Sunburst
spells.materials: fire and a piece of sunstone
spells.description: A sphere of searing light springs from a point you choose within range. Creatures in a 60-foot radius must make Constitution saves or take 12d6 radiant damage.

spells.name: Holy Aura
spells.materials: a reliquary worth at least 500 sp
spells.description: You emanate a 30-foot aura of divine power. Good creatures within the aura gain advantage on saves, bad creatures have disadvantage on attacks.

spells.name: Power Word Stun
spells.description: You speak a word of power that stuns a creature within 60 feet that has 150 hit points or fewer. It is stunned until the end of your next turn.

spells.name: Mind Blank
spells.description: A creature you touch is immune to psychic damage and to divination magic.

spells.name: Magic Missile II
spells.description: You create three glowing darts. Each dart hits a creature you choose within range, dealing 1d4+1 force damage.

spells.name: Magic Missile III
spells.description: You create three glowing darts. Each dart hits a creature you choose within range, dealing 1d4+1 force damage.

spells.name: Magic Missile IV
spells.description: You create three glowing darts. Each dart hits a creature you choose within range, dealing 1d4+1 force damage.

spells.name: Magic Missile V
spells.description: You create three glowing darts. Each dart hits a creature you choose within range, dealing 1d4+1 force damage.

spells.name: Greater Cure Wounds
spells.description: A creature you touch regains 3d8 hit points.

spells.name: Mass Cure Wounds
spells.description: A creature you touch regains 3d8 hit points.

spells.name: Enhanced Healing Word
spells.description: A creature you can see within range regains 2d4 hit points.

spells.name: Supreme Healing Word
spells.description: A creature you can see within range regains 2d4 hit points.

spells.name: Greater Armor of Agathys
spells.materials: a cup of water
spells.description: You gain 5 temporary hit points. When a creature hits you with a melee attack, it takes 5 cold damage.

spells.name: Supreme Armor of Agathys
spells.materials: a cup of water
spells.description: You gain 5 temporary hit points. When a creature hits you with a melee attack, it takes 5 cold damage.

spells.description: Each creature in a 15-foot cone must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking 3d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

spells.name: Enhanced Lightning Bolt
spells.materials: a bit of fur and a rod of amber, crystal, or glass

spells.description: Each creature in a 60-foot cone must make a Constitution saving throw or take 8d8 cold damage.

spells.materials: a piece of fur; a piece of amber, crystal, or glass; and a pinch of salt
spells.description: You hurl a bolt of lightning that arcs between creatures. Each creature must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 10d8 lightning damage.

spells.name: Supreme Chain Lightning

spells.name: Enhanced Disintegrate
spells.materials: a lodestone and a pinch of powder iron
spells.description: A beam of green energy springs from your finger. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 10d8 force damage. If it's reduced to 0 hp, it disintegrates.

spells.name: Greater Disintegrate

spells.description: A beam of green energy springs from your finger. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 10d8 force damage. If it's reduced to 0 hp, it disintegrates.

spells.name: Supreme Disintegrate
spells.materials: a lodestone and a pinch of powder iron
spells.description: A beam of green energy springs from your finger. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 10d8 force damage. If it's reduced to 0 hp, it disintegrates.

spells.name: Enhanced Delayed Blast Fireball
spells.materials: a tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur
spells.description: A sphere of fire appears at a point within range. At the end of each turn, you can detonate it or move it. When detonated, each creature in a 20-foot radius makes a Dexterity save or takes 12d6 fire damage.

spells.name: Supreme Delayed Blast Fireball
spells.materials: a tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur
spells.description: A sphere of fire appears at a point within range. At the end of each turn, you can detonate it or move it. When detonated, each creature in a 20-foot radius makes a Dexterity save or takes 12d6 fire damage.

spells.name: Chromatic Orb
spells.materials: a diamond worth at least 50 gp
spells.description: You hurl a 4-inch-diameter sphere of energy at a creature you can see within range. Choose acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder for the type of orb you create, and then make a ranged spell attack.

spells.name: Mage Armor
spells.materials: a piece of cured leather
spells.description: You touch a willing creature who isn't wearing armor, and a protective magical force surrounds it. Your AC becomes 13 + your Dexterity modifier.

spells.name: Witch Bolt
spells.materials: a twig from a tree that has been struck by lightning
spells.description: A beam of crackling, blue energy springs from your hand to a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 1d12 lightning damage.

spells.name: Faerie Fire
spells.description: Each object in a 20-foot cube within range is outlined in blue, green, or violet light. Creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls against targets they can't see.

spells.name: Wall of Fire
spells.materials: a piece of coal
spells.description: You create a wall of fire on a solid surface within range. Any creature that ends its turn within 10 feet of the wall takes 5d8 fire damage.

spells.name: Telekinesis
spells.description: You gain the ability to move or manipulate creatures or objects by thought. Choose one creature or object of nonmagical matter that you can see within range.

spells.name: Enhanced Chromatic Orb
spells.materials: a diamond worth at least 50 gp
spells.description: You hurl a 4-inch-diameter sphere of energy at a creature you can see within range. Choose acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder for the type of orb you create, and then make a ranged spell attack.

spells.name: Greater Chromatic Orb
spells.materials: a diamond worth at least 50 gp
spells.description: You hurl a 4-inch-diameter sphere of energy at a creature you can see within range. Choose acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder for the type of orb you create, and then make a ranged spell attack.

spells.name: Supreme Chromatic Orb
spells.materials: a diamond worth at least 50 gp
spells.description: You hurl a 4-inch-diameter sphere of energy at a creature you can see within range. Choose acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder for the type of orb you create, and then make a ranged spell attack.

spells.name: Enhanced Mage Armor
spells.materials: a piece of cured leather
spells.description: You touch a willing creature who isn't wearing armor, and a protective magical force surrounds it. Your AC becomes 13 + your Dexterity modifier.

spells.name: Supreme Mage Armor
spells.materials: a piece of cured leather
spells.description: You touch a willing creature who isn't wearing armor, and a protective magical force surrounds it. Your AC becomes 13 + your Dexterity modifier.

spells.name: Enhanced Witch Bolt
spells.materials: a twig from a tree that has been struck by lightning
spells.description: A beam of crackling, blue energy springs from your hand to a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 1d12 lightning damage.

spells.name: Greater Witch Bolt
spells.materials: a twig from a tree that has been struck by lightning
spells.description: A beam of crackling, blue energy springs from your hand to a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 1d12 lightning damage.

spells.name: Supreme Witch Bolt
spells.materials: a twig from a tree that has been struck by lightning
spells.description: A beam of crackling, blue energy springs from your hand to a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 1d12 lightning damage.

spells.name: Enhanced Faerie Fire
spells.description: Each object in a 20-foot cube within range is outlined in blue, green, or violet light. Creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls against targets they can't see.

spells.name: Greater Faerie Fire
spells.description: Each object in a 20-foot cube within range is outlined in blue, green, or violet light. Creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls against targets they can't see.

spells.name: Supreme Faerie Fire
spells.description: Each object in a 20-foot cube within range is outlined in blue, green, or violet light. Creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls against targets they can't see.

spells.name: Enhanced Wall of Fire
spells.materials: a piece of coal
spells.description: You create a wall of fire on a solid surface within range. Any creature that ends its turn within 10 feet of the wall takes 5d8 fire damage.

spells.name: Greater Wall of Fire
spells.materials: a piece of coal
spells.description: You create a wall of fire on a solid surface within range. Any creature that ends its turn within 10 feet of the wall takes 5d8 fire damage.

spells.name: Supreme Wall of Fire
spells.materials: a piece of coal
spells.description: You create a wall of fire on a solid surface within range. Any creature that ends its turn within 10 feet of the wall takes 5d8 fire damage.

spells.name: Enhanced Telekinesis
spells.description: You gain the ability to move or manipulate creatures or objects by thought. Choose one creature or object of nonmagical matter that you can see within range.

spells.name: Greater Telekinesis
spells.description: You gain the ability to move or manipulate creatures or objects by thought. Choose one creature or object of nonmagical matter that you can see within range.

spells.name: Supreme Telekinesis
spells.description: You gain the ability to move or manipulate creatures or objects by thought. Choose one creature or object of nonmagical matter that you can see within range.

spells.name: Minor Illusion
spells.materials: a bit of fleece
spells.description: You create a sound or an image of an object within range that lasts for the duration.

spells.name: Poison Spray
spells.description: A creature you can see within range must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take 1d12 poison damage.

spells.name: Ray of Frost
spells.description: A frigid beam of blue-white light springs from your hand. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 cold damage.

spells.name: Thorn Whip
spells.materials: the stem of a plant with thorns
spells.description: Make a melee spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 1d6 piercing damage, and you pull the target up to 5 feet closer to you.

spells.name: Prestidigitation
spells.description: You perform a magical sleight of hand using sleight of hand tricks or simple magical effects.

spells.name: Alarm
spells.materials: a tiny bell and a piece of fine silver wire
spells.description: You set an alarm against unwanted intrusion. Choose a door, window, or area within range that you can see when you cast the spell.

spells.name: Bane
spells.materials: a drop of blood
spells.description: Up to three creatures of your choice that you can see within range must make Charisma saving throws or subtract 1d4 from the next attack roll or ability check within 1 minute.

spells.name: Bless
spells.materials: a sprinkling of holy water
spells.description: You bless up to three creatures of your choice within range. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or an ability check before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to the attack roll or ability check.

spells.name: Comprehend Languages
spells.materials: a pinch of soot and salt
spells.description: For the duration, you understand the literal meaning of any spoken language that you hear.

spells.name: Feather Fall
spells.materials: a small feather or piece of down
spells.description: Choose up to five falling creatures within range. A falling creature's descent slows to 60 feet per round until the spell ends.

spells.name: Find Familiar
spells.materials: 10 gp worth of charcoal, incense, and herbs that must be consumed by fire in a brass brazier
spells.description: You gain the service of a familiar, a spirit that takes animal form you choose. It acts independently of you, but it always obeys your commands.

spells.name: Fog Cloud
spells.description: You create a 20-foot radius sphere of fog centered on a point within range. Creatures and objects more than 5 feet away are completely obscured.

spells.name: Identify
spells.materials: a pearl worth at least 100 gp and an owl feather
spells.description: You choose one object that you must touch. If it is magical, you learn its properties and how to use them, whether it requires attunement, and how many charges it has, if any.

spells.name: Jump
spells.materials: a grasshopper's hind leg
spells.description: You touch a creature. The creature's jump distance is tripled until the spell ends.

spells.name: Silent Image
spells.materials: a bit of fleece
spells.description: You create the image of an object, a creature, or some other visible phenomenon that is no larger than a 15-foot cube.

spells.name: Darkvision
spells.materials: either a pinch of dried carrot or an agate
spells.description: You touch a willing creature to grant it the ability to see in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light.

spells.name: Detect Thoughts
spells.materials: a copper piece
spells.description: For the duration, you can sense the presence of thoughts within 30 feet of you.

spells.name: Enhance Ability
spells.materials: fur or a feather from a beast
spells.description: You touch a creature and give it one of the following magical enhancements for the duration.

spells.name: Lesser Restoration
spells.description: You touch a creature and can end either one disease or one condition afflicting it.

spells.name: Levitate
spells.materials: either a small leather loop or a piece of golden wire bent into a cup shape
spells.description: One creature of your choice that you can see within range rises vertically up to 20 feet and remains suspended there for the duration.

spells.name: Magic Weapon
spells.description: You touch a nonmagical weapon. Until the spell ends, that weapon becomes a magic weapon with a +1 bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls.

spells.name: Misty Step
spells.description: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see.

spells.name: Pass Without Trace
spells.materials: ashes from a burned leaf of mistletoe and a sprig of spruce
spells.description: A veil of shadows and silence radiates from you. For the duration, each creature of your choice that you can see within 30 feet has advantage on Stealth checks.

spells.name: Suggestion
spells.materials: a snake tongue and either a bit of honeycomb or a drop of sweet oil
spells.description: You suggest a course of activity, phrased in a compelling manner. Choose one creature you can see within range that can hear and understand you.

spells.name: Counterspell
spells.description: You attempt to interrupt a creature casting a spell. If the creature is casting a spell of 3rd level or lower, its spell fails and has no effect.

spells.name: Dispel Magic
spells.description: Choose a creature, object, or magical effect within range. Any spell of 3rd level or lower ends. For each spell of 4th level or higher, make an ability check.

spells.name: Fly
spells.materials: a feather from any bird
spells.description: You touch a willing creature. The target gains a flying speed of 60 feet for the duration.

spells.name: Haste
spells.materials: a shaving of licorice root
spells.description: Choose a willing creature that you can see within range. Until the spell ends, the target can use an action, bonus action, and reaction on each of its turns in combat.

spells.name: Slow
spells.materials: a drop of molasses
spells.description: You alter time around up to six creatures of your choice in a 40-foot cube within range. Each creature must make a Wisdom saving throw or be affected by this spell for the duration.

spells.name: Freedom of Movement
spells.materials: a leather strap, bound around the arm or a similar appendage
spells.description: You touch a willing creature. For the duration, the target's movement is unaffected by difficult terrain, and spells and other magical effects can't reduce the target's speed.

spells.name: Greater Invisibility
spells.description: You or a creature you touch becomes invisible until the spell ends. Anything the target is wearing or carrying is invisible as long as it is on the target's person.

spells.name: Stoneskin
spells.materials: diamond dust worth 100 gp, which the spell consumes
spells.description: This spell bolsters a creature's body to harden it against injury. The target has resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

spells.name: Hold Monster
spells.materials: a small, straight piece of iron
spells.description: Choose a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for the duration.

spells.name: Mass Cure Wounds
spells.description: A wave of healing energy washes out from a point of your choice within range. Choose any number of creatures in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on that point.

spells.name: Enhanced Poison Spray
spells.description: A creature you can see within range must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take 1d12 poison damage.

spells.name: Greater Poison Spray
spells.description: A creature you can see within range must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take 1d12 poison damage.

spells.name: Supreme Poison Spray
spells.description: A creature you can see within range must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take 1d12 poison damage.

spells.name: Enhanced Ray of Frost
spells.description: A frigid beam of blue-white light springs from your hand. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 cold damage.

spells.name: Greater Ray of Frost
spells.description: A frigid beam of blue-white light springs from your hand. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 cold damage.

spells.name: Supreme Ray of Frost
spells.description: A frigid beam of blue-white light springs from your hand. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 cold damage.

spells.name: Enhanced Thorn Whip
spells.materials: the stem of a plant with thorns
spells.description: Make a melee spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 1d6 piercing damage, and you pull the target up to 5 feet closer to you.

spells.name: Greater Thorn Whip
spells.materials: the stem of a plant with thorns
spells.description: Make a melee spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 1d6 piercing damage, and you pull the target up to 5 feet closer to you.

spells.name: Supreme Thorn Whip
spells.materials: the stem of a plant with thorns
spells.description: Make a melee spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 1d6 piercing damage, and you pull the target up to 5 feet closer to you.

spells.name: Enhanced Bane
spells.materials: a drop of blood
spells.description: Up to three creatures of your choice that you can see within range must make Charisma saving throws or subtract 1d4 from the next attack roll or ability check within 1 minute.

spells.name: Greater Bane
spells.materials: a drop of blood
spells.description: Up to three creatures of your choice that you can see within range must make Charisma saving throws or subtract 1d4 from the next attack roll or ability check within 1 minute.

spells.name: Supreme Bane
spells.materials: a drop of blood
spells.description: Up to three creatures of your choice that you can see within range must make Charisma saving throws or subtract 1d4 from the next attack roll or ability check within 1 minute.

spells.name: Enhanced Bless
spells.materials: a sprinkling of holy water
spells.description: You bless up to three creatures of your choice within range. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or an ability check before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to the attack roll or ability check.

spells.name: Greater Bless
spells.materials: a sprinkling of holy water
spells.description: You bless up to three creatures of your choice within range. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or an ability check before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to the attack roll or ability check.

spells.name: Supreme Bless
spells.materials: a sprinkling of holy water
spells.description: You bless up to three creatures of your choice within range. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or an ability check before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to the attack roll or ability check.

spells.name: Enhanced Flaming Sphere
spells.materials: a bit of tallow, a pinch of brimstone, and a dusting of powdered iron
spells.description: A sphere of flames appears and moves where you direct it. Creatures within 5 feet must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking 2d6 fire damage on a failed save.

spells.name: Greater Flaming Sphere
spells.materials: a bit of tallow, a pinch of brimstone, and a dusting of powdered iron
spells.description: A sphere of flames appears and moves where you direct it. Creatures within 5 feet must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking 2d6 fire damage on a failed save.

spells.name: Supreme Flaming Sphere
spells.materials: a bit of tallow, a pinch of brimstone, and a dusting of powdered iron
spells.description: A sphere of flames appears and moves where you direct it. Creatures within 5 feet must make a Dexterity saving throw, taking 2d6 fire damage on a failed save.

spells.name: Enhanced Suggestion
spells.materials: a snake tongue and either a bit of honeycomb or a drop of sweet oil
spells.description: You suggest a course of activity, phrased in a compelling manner. Choose one creature you can see within range that can hear and understand you.

spells.name: Greater Suggestion
spells.materials: a snake tongue and either a bit of honeycomb or a drop of sweet oil
spells.description: You suggest a course of activity, phrased in a compelling manner. Choose one creature you can see within range that can hear and understand you.

spells.name: Mass Suggestion
spells.materials: a snake tongue and either a bit of honeycomb or a drop of sweet oil
spells.description: You suggest a course of activity, phrased in a compelling manner. Choose one creature you can see within range that can hear and understand you.

spells.name: Greater Mass Cure Wounds
spells.description: A wave of healing energy washes out from a point of your choice within range. Choose any number of creatures in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on that point.

spells.name: Supreme Mass Cure Wounds
spells.description: A wave of healing energy washes out from a point of your choice within range. Choose any number of creatures in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on that point.

spells.name: Tasha's Hideous Laughter
spells.materials: tiny prop such as a doll, puppet, or picture
spells.description: A creature of your choice that you can see within range perceives everything as hilariously funny and falls prone, unable to stand.

spells.name: Unseen Servant
spells.materials: a bit of string and a bit of wood
spells.description: You create an invisible, mindless spirit that performs simple tasks at your command until the spell ends.

spells.name: Cloud of Daggers
spells.materials: several daggers or other melee weapons worth at least 1 sp each
spells.description: You fill the air with spinning daggers in a cube 5 feet on each side, centered on a point you choose within range.

spells.name: Enthrall
spells.description: You weave a distracting pattern of words, causing creatures of your choice that you can see within range and that can hear you to make a Wisdom saving throw.

spells.name: Phantasmal Force
spells.materials: a bit of fleece
spells.description: You craft an illusion that takes root in the mind of a creature that you can see within range.

spells.name: Pyrotechnics
spells.description: You cause a nonmagical flame within range to produce one of the following effects at your choice.

spells.name: See Invisibility
spells.materials: a pinch of talc and a small sprinkling of powdered silver
spells.description: For the duration, you see invisible creatures and objects as if they were visible, and you can see into the Ethereal Plane.

spells.name: Spiritual Weapon
spells.description: You create a spectral, floating weapon within range that lasts for the spell's duration or until you cast this spell again.

spells.name: Fear
spells.materials: the heart of a cockatrice
spells.description: Each creature in a 30-foot cone must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or drop whatever it is holding and take the Frightened condition.

spells.name: Hypnotic Pattern
spells.materials: a glowing stick of incense or a crystal vial filled with phosphorescent material
spells.description: You create a mesmeric pattern on a flat surface within range. Each creature in the pattern when you cast the spell must make a Wisdom saving throw.

spells.name: Major Image
spells.materials: a bit of fleece
spells.description: You create the image of an object, a creature, or some other visible phenomenon that is no larger than a 20-foot cube.

spells.name: Remove Curse
spells.description: At your touch, all curses affecting one creature or object end. If the object is a cursed magic item, its curse remains, but the spell breaks the owner's attunement to it.

spells.name: Revivify
spells.materials: diamonds worth 300 gp, which the spell consumes
spells.description: You touch a creature that has been dead for no more than 1 minute. That creature returns to life with 1 hit point.

spells.name: Speak with Dead
spells.materials: burning incense, an object of the corpse's former life, and diamond dust worth at least 150 gp
spells.description: You grant the semblance of life and intelligence to a corpse within range, allowing it to answer the questions you pose.

spells.name: Spirit Guardians
spells.materials: a holy symbol
spells.description: You call forth spirits to protect you. They flit around you to a distance of 15 feet for the duration.

spells.name: Stinking Cloud
spells.materials: a rotten egg or several skunk cabbage leaves
spells.description: A 20-foot-radius sphere of yellow, nauseating gas springs from a point of your choice within range.

spells.name: Tongues
spells.materials: a small clay model of a ziggurat
spells.description: This spell grants the creature the ability to understand any spoken language it hears.

spells.name: Arcane Eye
spells.materials: a glass eye worth 25 gp
spells.description: For the spell's duration, you can use an action to see through the eye's line of sight as if you were looking out of it.

spells.name: Conjure Minor Elementals
spells.description: You summon elementals that appear in unoccupied spaces within range that you can see.

spells.name: Control Water
spells.materials: a drop of water and a pinch of dust
spells.description: Until the spell ends, you control any freestanding water inside an area you choose.

spells.name: Dimension Door
spells.description: You teleport yourself from your current location to any other spot within range that you can see.

spells.name: Dominate Beast
spells.description: You attempt to beguile a beast that you can see within range. It must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by you for the duration.

spells.name: Locate Creature
spells.materials: a bit of fur from a bloodhound
spells.description: Describe or name a creature that is familiar to you. You sense the direction to the creature's location as long as that creature is within 1,000 miles of you.

spells.name: Phantasmal Killer
spells.description: You tap into the nightmares of a creature you can see within range and create an illusory manifestation of its deepest fears visible only to that creature.

spells.name: Polymorph
spells.materials: a caterpillar cocoon
spells.description: This spell transforms a creature that you can see within range into a new form. An unwilling creature must make a Wisdom saving throw to avoid the effect.

spells.name: Animate Objects
spells.description: Objects come alive at your command. Choose up to ten nonmagical objects that are not being worn or carried within range.

spells.name: Dominate Person
spells.description: You attempt to beguile a humanoid you can see within range. It must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by you for the duration.

spells.name: Dream
spells.materials: a handful of sand, finely sifted through silk
spells.description: This spell shapes a creature's dreams. Choose a creature known to you as your target of this spell.

spells.name: Geas
spells.description: You place a magical command on a creature that you can see within range, forcing it to carry out some service or refrain from some action or course of activity as you decide.

spells.name: Greater Restoration
spells.materials: diamond dust worth at least 100 gp, which the spell consumes
spells.description: You imbue a creature you touch with positive energy to undo a debilitating effect. You can reduce the creature's exhaustion level by one, or end one of the following effects.

spells.name: Insect Plague
spells.materials: a few grains of sugar, some kernels of grain, and a smear of fat
spells.description: A cloud of locusts springs from a point of your choice within range. The swarm spreads in a 30-foot-radius sphere from that point on the ground.

spells.name: Modify Memory
spells.description: You attempt to reshape another creature's memory. One creature that you can see must make a Wisdom saving throw.

spells.name: Scrying
spells.materials: a focus worth at least 1,000 gp, such as a crystal ball or silver mirror
spells.description: You can see and hear a particular creature that you choose on the same plane of existence as you.

spells.name: Teleportation Circle
spells.materials: rare chalks and inks infused with precious gems worth 50 gp
spells.description: As you cast this spell, you draw a 10-foot-diameter circle on the ground inscribed with sigils of power. Moving outward from this circle, you must inscribe another circle 10 feet away from the first.

spells.name: Disintegrate
spells.materials: a lodestone and a pinch of dust
spells.description: A thin green ray springs from your pointing finger. Choose a target that you can see within range. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw.

spells.name: Eyebite
spells.description: For the spell's duration, your eyes become an inky void imbued with dread power. You can use your action to cast the spell's effects.

spells.name: Mass Suggestion
spells.materials: a snake tongue and either a bit of honeycomb or a drop of sweet oil
spells.description: You suggest a course of activity, phrased in a compelling manner, to as many creatures as you can see within range that can hear and understand you.

spells.name: Otto's Irresistible Dance
spells.description: Choose one creature that you can see within range. The creature must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or fall prone, unable to stand, as magical energy forces it into a frenetic dance.

spells.name: Plane Shift
spells.materials: a forked, metal rod worth at least 250 gp, attuned to a particular plane of existence
spells.description: You and up to eight willing creatures who link hands in a circle are transported to a different plane of existence of your choosing.

spells.name: Reverse Gravity
spells.materials: lodestone and iron filings
spells.description: This spell reverses gravity in a 50-foot-radius, 100-foot tall cylinder centered on a point within range.

spells.name: Teleport
spells.description: This spell instantly transports you and up to eight willing creatures of your choice that you can see within range.

spells.name: Power Word Stun
spells.description: You speak a word of power that can compel one creature you can see within range to make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, it is stunned until the end of your next turn.

spells.name: Enhanced Cloud of Daggers
spells.materials: several daggers or other melee weapons worth at least 1 sp each
spells.description: You fill the air with spinning daggers in a cube 5 feet on each side, centered on a point you choose within range.

spells.name: Greater Cloud of Daggers
spells.materials: several daggers or other melee weapons worth at least 1 sp each
spells.description: You fill the air with spinning daggers in a cube 5 feet on each side, centered on a point you choose within range.

spells.name: Enhanced Spiritual Weapon
spells.description: You create a spectral, floating weapon within range that lasts for the spell's duration or until you cast this spell again.

spells.name: Greater Spiritual Weapon
spells.description: You create a spectral, floating weapon within range that lasts for the spell's duration or until you cast this spell again.

spells.name: Enhanced Spirit Guardians
spells.materials: a holy symbol
spells.description: You call forth spirits to protect you. They flit around you to a distance of 15 feet for the duration.

spells.name: Greater Spirit Guardians
spells.materials: a holy symbol
spells.description: You call forth spirits to protect you. They flit around you to a distance of 15 feet for the duration.

spells.name: Enhanced Fear
spells.materials: the heart of a cockatrice
spells.description: Each creature in a 30-foot cone must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or drop whatever it is holding and take the Frightened condition.

spells.name: Greater Fear
spells.materials: the heart of a cockatrice
spells.description: Each creature in a 30-foot cone must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or drop whatever it is holding and take the Frightened condition.

spells.name: Enhanced Phantasmal Killer
spells.description: You tap into the nightmares of a creature you can see within range and create an illusory manifestation of its deepest fears visible only to that creature.

spells.name: Greater Phantasmal Killer
spells.description: You tap into the nightmares of a creature you can see within range and create an illusory manifestation of its deepest fears visible only to that creature.

spells.name: Protection from Evil and Good
spells.materials: holy water or powdered silver and iron
spells.description: Until the spell ends, one willing creature you touch is protected against certain types of creatures: aberrations, celestials, dragons, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead.

spells.name: Hex
spells.materials: pearlescent horn shavings
spells.description: You place a curse on a creature that you can see within range. Until the spell ends, you deal an extra 1d6 necrotic damage to the target whenever you hit it with an attack.

spells.name: Barkskin
spells.materials: a handful of oak bark
spells.description: You touch a willing creature. Until the spell ends, the target's skin has a rough, bark-like appearance, and the target's AC can't be less than 16, regardless of what kind of armor it is wearing.

spells.name: Locate Animals or Plants
spells.materials: a bit of fur from a bloodhound
spells.description: Describe or name a specific kind of beast or plant. Concentrating on the voice of the natural world in your surroundings, you learn the direction and distance to the closest creature or plant of that kind.

spells.name: Locate Object
spells.materials: a forked twig
spells.description: Describe or name an object that is familiar to you. You sense the direction to the object's location, as long as that object is within 1,000 feet of you.

spells.name: Beacon of Hope
spells.description: This spell bestows hope and vitality. Choose any number of creatures within range. For the duration, each target has advantage on Wisdom saving throws and death saving throws.

spells.name: Conjure Animals
spells.description: You summon fey creatures that appear in unoccupied spaces that you can see within range. Choose one of the following options.

spells.name: Glyph of Warding
spells.materials: incense and powdered diamond worth at least 200 gp
spells.description: When you cast this spell, you inscribe a glyph that harms other creatures, using either ink that contains a special ingredient worth at least 200 gp per dose or a powder made from gemstone dust worth at least 200 gp per dose.

spells.name: Magic Circle
spells.materials: salt, and powdered silver and iron worth at least 15 gp
spells.description: You create a 10-foot-radius, 20-foot-tall cylinder of magical energy centered on a point on the ground that you can see within range.

spells.name: Water Breathing
spells.materials: a short reed or piece of straw
spells.description: This spell grants up to ten willing creatures you can see within range the ability to breathe underwater until the spell ends.

spells.name: Vampiric Touch
spells.materials: a bat wing and a drop of blood
spells.description: The touch of your shadow-wreathed hand can siphon life force from others to heal your wounds.

spells.name: Banishment
spells.materials: an item distasteful to the target
spells.description: One creature that you can see within range must succeed on a Charisma saving throw or be banished.

spells.name: Conjure Woodland Beings
spells.materials: one holly berry per creature summoned
spells.description: You summon fey creatures that appear in unoccupied spaces you can see within range. Choose one of the following options for what appears.

spells.name: Divination
spells.materials: incense and a sacrificial offering appropriate to your religion, together worth at least 25 gp
spells.description: Your magic and an offering put you in contact with a god or a god's servants. You ask a single question concerning a specific goal, event, or activity to occur within 7 days.

spells.name: Giant Insect
spells.description: You transform up to ten insects that you can see within range into giant versions of their natural forms for the duration.

spells.name: Mordenkainen's Private Sanctum
spells.materials: a thin sheet of lead, a piece of opaque glass, a wad of cotton or cloth, and powdered chrysolite
spells.description: You create a magical barrier around an area up to 100 feet on a side. The barrier is invisible to normal sight but visible to creatures that have truesight.

spells.name: Awaken
spells.materials: an agate worth at least 1,000 gp, which the spell consumes, as well as other herbs and incense worth at least 100 gp
spells.description: After spending the required time chanting, music, or otherwise performing the Role for the spell, you touch a beast or plant. The target must have either no Intelligence score or an Intelligence of 3 or less.

spells.name: Conjure Elemental
spells.materials: burning incense for air, soft clay for earth, salt water for water, or phosphorus for fire
spells.description: You call forth an elemental servant. Choose an area of air, earth, fire, or water that fills a 10-foot cube within range.

spells.name: Creation
spells.materials: a tiny piece of matter of the same type of the item you plan to create
spells.description: You pull wisps of shadow material from the Shadowfell to create a nonmagical item of vegetable matter within range: soft goods, rope, wood, or something similar.

spells.name: Reincarnate
spells.materials: rare oils and unguents worth at least 1,000 gp, which the spell consumes, and a jeweled ornament worth at least 50 gp that you use as a focus, which doesn't get consumed
spells.description: You touch a dead humanoid or a humanoid corpse. Provided that the creature has been dead no longer than 10 days, the spell forms a new adult body for it and then enters the new body.

spells.name: Wall of Stone
spells.materials: a small block of granite
spells.description: A wall of nonmagical stone springs into existence at a point of your choice within range.

spells.name: Sunburst
spells.materials: fire and a piece of sunstone
spells.description: Brilliant sunlight flashes in a 60-foot radius centered on a point you choose within range. Each creature in that light must make a Constitution saving throw.

spells.name: Wish
spells.description: Wish is the mightiest spell a mortal creature can cast. By simply speaking aloud, you can alter the very foundations of reality in accord with your desires.
